title: Scallop - store crypto & fiat in one place
body:
**Proposal for:** [Scallop]

![image](https://www.acnnewswire.com/topimg/scallop.650x200.jpg)

**What is Scallop?**
Scallop is a one-stop solution for cryptocurrency and banking services. It’s an innovative fintech ecosystem built to offer users a faster and more efficient way to securely manage crypto and fiat currencies in a single place.

Scallop combines decentralised financial services with banking features such as banking accounts, cards, remittance and much more - all aimed at promoting the general usage of crypto in daily life.

Scallop’s mission is to bring digital assets into mainstream use and accelerate the transition to a more equitable and decentralised ecosystem

**Litepaper**
[link](https://www.scallopx.com/policy/Scallop_Litepaper.pdf)

### Technical details

- **Token Name:** [Scallop + sclp]
- **Token Address:** [0xF2c96E402c9199682d5dED26D3771c6B192c01af]
- **Token Type:** [Token, finance, payment gateway]
- **Token Chain** [Binance Smart Chain, Ethereum]
- **Link to the whitepaper:** [https://www.scallopx.com/policy/Scallop_Litepaper.pdf]
- **Team doxxed:** [Yes]

### Functional details

**Circulating supply**: 20,000,000 SCLP
**Max supply** : 100,000,000 SCLP

Scallop mission is to bring digital assets into mainstream use and bridge the gap between decentralised and traditional finance. For the first time, store crypto & fiat in one place.

**Key features**

**Store crypto and fiat in one place**
Access traditional and decentralised finance with zero friction.

**Access DeFi from a fiat account**
All the functionality of protocols without the complexity.

**Keep full control of your keys**
Our wallets are secured with CC EAL6+ Secure element; Secure Java OS.

![image](https://www.scallopx.com/static/media/scallop-coin.670d4f5b.png)

Scallop Coin (SCLP) is a native BEP20 and ERC20 token of the Scallop platform that empowers the Scallop Ecosystem. SCLP has multiple uses:

For receiving trading bonus payments and much more
Stake SCLP to open accounts and access services
Payment of transaction fees
Transaction fees, exchange fees and monthly management fees

## Fund allocation and personal opinion

I believe in this project and have long term potential. It used to combine and close the gap between crypto and fiat. 

I witnessed this token spike up to $100 from 0.15 but stabilized at $3 right now even BTC and ETH in red sea.

If you believe in this project too, please cote. This is not meme and small project. It have long term agenda and you can research for yourself. I believe in this project and let's make profit together.

Thank
